argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fmpt2d.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) |
| 2 |  | fmpt2d.1 | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> B ) ) |
| 3 |  | fmpt2d.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ y e. A ) -> ( F ` y ) e. C ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. A B e. V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> B ) = ( x e. A |-> B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fnmpt | |- ( A. x e. A B e. V -> ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( ph -> ( F Fn A <-> ( x e. A |-> B ) Fn A ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 10 | 3 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. y e. A ( F ` y ) e. C ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( F : A --> C <-> ( F Fn A /\ A. y e. A ( F ` y ) e. C ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> F : A --> C ) |
